author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chanticleer Holdings Q1 Loss Per Share $0.83
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Chanticleer Holdings Inc:
* CHANTICLEER HOLDINGS REPORTS FIRST QUARTER OPERATING RESULTS
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.83 * Q1 REVENUE ROSE 1.4 PERCENT TO $10 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
